Question.Subject: Website that forces you to keep typing?
Question.Content:
I found this website awhile ago -- you have to keep typing, because the second you stop typing it starts to delete some of your work. I forget what it is called and I cannot find it on google, but its purpose is to help you finish an essay, overcome writer's block, etc.
Thank you!!
Question.ChosenAnswer: haha thats really awesome! i don't know of it but ill have a look for it. I had writers block too, and actually ended up writing a book to cure it. It's a simple and fun guide to get you out of your ruts. you can get it at amazon.com under Midday Crisis or at my website www.middaycrisis.com hope this helps!!! let me know if it does :)
